docs.title: Teng Li
docs.text:
M.S. Department of Computer Science University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC)

Email: tengli[at]gmail.com | Website: lnteng.github.io | GitHub: github.com/lnteng

docs.title: Biography
docs.text: I am pursuing the M.S. degree from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) from 2023 to 2026. My research interests include blockchain, smart contract and program analysis.

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
• Master, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, Chengdu [Aug 2023 – Present]

  • Bachelor, China University of Geosciences (Wuhan), Wuhan [Aug 2019 – Jun 2023]

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Programming Languages: Python, Java, C++
  • Technologies: Program Analysis, Reverse Engineering
  • Other Skills: Smart Contract Security, Compiler Theory

docs.title: Publications
docs.text:
• Empirical Study of Move Smart Contract Security: Introducing MoveScan for Enhanced Analysis Published in the 33rd ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA 2024).

  • Enhancing The Open Network: Definition and Automated Detection of Smart Contract Defects Published in the 47th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2025).
